statements: SELECT * FROM media_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM media_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE conversions > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, return_on_investment FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE return_on_investment < 500;
SELECT * FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY return_on_investment DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate, return_on_investment FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate >= 0.6 AND return_on_investment < 500 ORDER BY click_through_rate ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate, conversions FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.7 OR conversions > 20 ORDER BY campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE return_on_investment BETWEEN 100 AND 1000 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions, return_on_investment FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate IS NULL ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions, return_on_investment FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY return_on_investment DESC;
SELECT start_date, end_date, click_through_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM marketing_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, return_on_investment FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE return_on_investment > 2.0 ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY impressions DESC, revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_conversions > 10;
SELECT * FROM ClickThroughRates WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT clicks, impressions FROM ClickThroughRates WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ClickThroughRates;
SELECT campaign_id, date, number_of_conversions FROM Conversions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT roi_id, expenditure, revenue FROM ReturnOnInvestment WHERE expenditure > revenue;
SELECT * FROM ClickThroughRates WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT campaign_id, date, clicks FROM ClickThroughRates ORDER BY date DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, AVG(impressions) AS avg_impressions FROM ClickThroughRates GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT ConversionDate, campaign_id, number_of_conversions FROM Conversions JOIN ClickThroughRates USING (campaign_id) WHERE number_of_conversions > 5;
SELECT c.campaign_id, c.date, r.expenditure, r.revenue FROM ClickThroughRates c JOIN ReturnOnInvestment r USING (campaign_id) WHERE r.revenue > r.expenditure;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions FROM click_through_rates WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate FROM conversions ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, investment_amount, revenue_generated, return_on_investment FROM return_on_investment WHERE return_on_investment > 1.5;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions, click_through_rate FROM click_through_rates LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_id, total_conversions, conversion_rate FROM conversions WHERE total_conversions > 5;
SELECT campaign_id, investment_amount, revenue_generated, return_on_investment FROM return_on_investment ORDER BY return_on_investment DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates JOIN conversions ON click_through_rates.campaign_id = conversions.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Clicks ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM Conversions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(roi_value) AS total_roi FROM ROI GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_roi DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT click_id, user_id FROM Clicks WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS conversion_count FROM Conversions GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING conversion_count > 5 ORDER BY conversion_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(roi_value) AS avg_roi FROM ROI WHERE roi_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY campaign_id;
